name: 69 Yuki Love
description:
69 Yuki Love Allows you to plunge into an exciting and fairly simple puzzle. Lovely Yuki is waiting for you to collect all the puzzle pieces and unlock the graphic reward. Your devoted cat girl, together with relaxing music and meditative gameplay, will allow to have a good rest after work . Features
16 unique levels in Full HD
Relaxing music
Meditative gameplay
16 Achievements
Your devoted girl cat is waiting for you!
